about_the_game:
Oath of the Necromancer is a rogue-like & bullet-heaven mix; survive by raising hordes of skeletons to fight alongside you against the many foes of ancient Egypt and Greece.

In the name of Serapis, the ancient Graeco-Egyptian God of life and death, you rebuild a lost religion, raise legendary heroes, find mighty relics, and raise powerful armies of the dead.

How long will you stay alive?

The game features:

  • Many different summonable servants & strategies to discover

  • Hordes of enemies to run over

  • 50+ Upgrades

  • 30+ strategy-defining Relics

  • A journey through ancient Egypt & Greece

  • Twitch Integration! Viewers can take over summons with chat commands.

  • Lots of bones!

DISCORD:

If you’d like to stay up to date, be sure to join us on discord for the most recent updates, and options to give feedback! We want to involve YOU in the development!

UPDATES & FUTURE

This game is still in development. There will be many changes and improvements. Many inspired by play-testers and the community.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 2.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 4 Cores / 3.5 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / AMD RX 570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The enemies number in the thousands, let's use those numbers against them. Raise the bones of the fallen, and fight the odds. Take up the Oath, create an army of the undead, strategize on how to build it, and snowball your units into a powerhouse against your foes.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Spanish - Spain, Romanian, French, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
